EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit Lacerte Deferred Payment Option
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are receiving this communication because you recently applied for our Deferred Tax Option. Three of the most common reasons that preclude eligibility for the Deferred Payment Option: having an open balance past due, having an account on hold due to unresolved payment issues, and providing a non-sufficient funds check for payment.
Log in to My Account to select the payment option that works best for you. Alternatively, contact us at: Lacerte 800-765-7777 if you would like to add additional products to your license.
Thank you for choosing Lacerte Tax. We value you as a customer.
Sincerely,
The Lacerte Team
Intuit ProConnect Group
